attributes.action: lower vehicle fuel tax or provide more than token public transport in rural areas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
fuel tax to encourage greener transport choices is all well and good in cities - in rural areas where there simply is no public transport option given by the government to drive is the ONLY way to move about... unless we are all expected to eat roots and live off the land !
Example - The main route in my region boasts 4 buses a day, one in each direction morning and evening. None would get to local major towns in time for any regular job. nor leave the towns after everyday job ending times. I could not use it however hard i tried.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
